TextLibrary.Text: You did not defeat the Wasp, but you may enter the hive and try again.
You did not defeat the Troll, but you may try again.
You take the wings from the Giant Wasp. When you also have the Ice Troll Hair, these can be taken back to Neehi.
You cut the hair from the Ice Troll. When you also have the Wasp Wings, this can be taken back to Neehi.
You now have both the wings from the Giant Wasp and the hair from the Ice Troll. These can now be taken back to Neehi.
Neehi pays you for the delivery.
You must search for a set of Wasp Wings and also find an Ice Troll.
You must now deliver the goods to Neehi in Gruuldok for your reward.
Ice Trolls live in the cold northern areas. They can Freeze their foes.
